name: gotosocial
tagline: A self-hosted federated social server compatible with ActivityPub
description: GoToSocial is a self-hosted, federated social network server compatible with Mastodon and ActivityPub. It focuses on lightweight deployment and better moderation tools for smaller communities and individuals.

features.title: Federated Social Networking
features.description: Run a social media server using the ActivityPub protocol

features.title: User Accounts
features.description: Create and manage local user profiles

features.title: Media Attachments
features.description: Share images and media in posts

features.title: Moderation Tools
features.description: Manage users and content with moderation features

features.title: API Compatibility
features.description: Provide APIs compatible with supported clients
